text_block_list.text:
That night, as I was heading to the training 
course to talk with Mejiro McQueen…
Ah, Trainer-san! I finally found you!
text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa

text_block_list.text:
There has been an update regarding the postponement 
of your team's disbandment, so I wanted to let 
you know as soon as possible.
text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa

text_block_list.text:
Hehe, please calm down. They're allowing you the first half of 
the year… The postponement will continue until the end of June.
text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa

text_block_list.text:
As an organization, our top priority is allowing 
our Uma Musume to focus on their races…
text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa

text_block_list.text:
It seems that they have decided on 
“waiting for a more convenient time.”
text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa

text_block_list.text:
That's great. So we won't have to worry about 
finding new members for the time being, and can 
focus on the Spring Tennō Shō instead…!

There is no need to thank me, I am merely the messenger. But I'm 
happy for you. Good luck in the Spring Tennō Shō!
text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa

text_block_list.text:
The empty training course. At this hour, all 
other Uma Musume should be in bed…
Hagh, Haaah… Ha, Haa…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Despite the time, Mejiro McQueen was once again 
continuing her nightly independent training.

It's obvious that she is overworking herself. Her form has 
deteriorated from fatigue and her balance is completely off.

Because of this, the results of her training will be poor and 
it's likely she will get hurt before the Spring Tennō…
…Ah, Haaah, Hah… Eaah!?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
As I was worrying about her, Mejiro McQueen staggered forward, 
collapsing to the ground in a cloud of dust.
McQueen!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Where…? Huh, Trainer-san? Why…?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
We're at the infirmary. 
You should lie down, it looks like you have a fever.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
We're at the infirmary. 
You should lie down, it looks like you have a fever.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
…A fever? Haa… 
I guess I was more exhausted than I realized.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
This reminds me of how I would often get fevers 
after frolicking around when I was little.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: That seems to be the case…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: …Wait, you knew about my independent training!?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Yeah, I was actually planning on discussing it with you today.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: …I see. As expected, you're as intuitive as ever.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
I assume the next thing you're going to say is 
“stop doing your independent training”, right?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
choice_data_list: I can't let this happen again.

text_block_list.text:
…I have no excuse for the disgraceful behavior I have 
shown you. I will follow your instructions from now on.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Now, in exchange for the ban on independent training, I want you 
to be able to rely on me even more. I want you to tell me how 
you really feel from now on.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Now, in exchange for the ban on independent training, I want you 
to be able to rely on me even more. I want you to tell me how 
you really feel from now on.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Your dream of winning the Tennō Shō, 
I'll be there with you every step of the way.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Your dream of winning the Tennō Shō, 
I'll be there with you every step of the way.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
How did you… Ah! 
Ryan told you, didn't she?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
…Jeez, so that's what your secret conversation 
was about. She's as meddlesome as ever I guess.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
But are you sure? You realize that if you truly do so, you will 
be tasked with carrying the Mejiro Family's burden as well.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, are you truly prepared for this? 
To become… of “one body and one mind” with me?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Hehe, that immediate reply… You really haven't 
changed since your days as a sub-trainer.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: You've always put us before yourself.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
…Well, if that is the case, 
I won't be holding back either.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
In order to achieve my dream of winning the Tennō Shō, I'm going 
to be monopolizing you from now on, Trainer-san.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
And in doing so, 
we will definitely win!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Yeah, we will definitely win, together!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Yeah, we will definitely win, together!
text_block_list.name: <username>
